org.dvb.ui

Class DVBBufferedImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Image
      • org.dvb.ui.DVBBufferedImage

  • public class DVBBufferedImage
extends Image
    Implementation of the DVBBufferedImage using delegates to java.awt.image.BufferedImage
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.6 $
    Author:
    Christian Köberl
    See Also:
    BufferedImage
